text:
# convert history into a univariate series
series = to_series(history)
Listing 18.8: Example of converting the window-based history data into a series.
Next, an ARIMA model can be deﬁned by passing arguments to the constructor of the
ARIMA class. We will specify an AR(7) model, which in ARIMA notation is ARIMA(7,0,0).
# define the model
model = ARIMA(series, order=(7,0,0))
Listing 18.9: Example of deﬁning an ARIMA model.
